data.name: XPresenterHelper
desc: This interface is a collection of functions that were necessary to implement larger parts of the presenter screen as extension.
The methods of this interface give access to services that could only be implemented in the Office core, not in an extension.
As the presenter screen is no extension any more, this hack can go again; it just needs clean-up.

methods.name: captureMouse
desc: Capture the mouse so that no other window will receive mouse events.
Note that this is a potentially dangerous method. Not calling releaseMouse eventually can lead to an unresponsive application.

methods.name: createCanvas
desc: Create a new canvas for the given window.

methods.name: createSharedCanvas
desc: Create a new canvas for the given window.
The new canvas is a wrapper around the given shared canvas. The wrapper only modifies the origin in all output and clipping methods.

methods.name: createWindow
desc: Create a new window as child window of the given parent window.

methods.name: getWindowExtentsRelative
desc: Return the bounding box of the given child window relative to the direct or indirect parent window.

methods.name: loadBitmap
desc: Load a bitmap with a given ID.

methods.name: toTop
desc: Move the specified window to the top of its stacking order.
As a result the window will be painted over all its overlapping siblings.
